SEARCH
Package sttrswing.model

Class Klingon

Object
Entity
Klingon
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasFaction, HasPosition, HasSymbol, Hittable, Positionable
public class Klingon extends Entity implements Hittable, HasFaction
Klingon handles Entity behaviour plus some extra behaviour including: processing an attack, handling the details of being hit, managing its own energy reserve.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Klingon(int x, int y)
    Constructs a Klingon instance at the given X and Y position.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    attack(Hittable hittable)
    Handles this Klingon attacking the given Hittable object, the Klingon deals damage equal to 1 third of its current energy reserves (rounded down).
    Faction
    faction()
    Return the Faction this belongs to.
    void
    hit(int damage)
    Hits the Klingon for an amount of damage, reducing their internal energy reserves and marking them for removal if they run out of energy.
    void
    scan()
    Marks this Entity as scanned, so it doesn't have to be scanned twice.
    String
    symbol()
    Returns a 3 character String representation of the Klingon with implicit communication of its internal state.

      public Faction faction()

      Specified by:

    • attack

      public int attack(Hittable hittable)
      Handles this Klingon attacking the given Hittable object, the Klingon deals damage equal to 1 third of its current energy reserves (rounded down). (this does not deplete its energy reserves).
      Parameters:
      hittable - - something we can hit
      Returns:
      how much damage was dealt by this Klingon in this attack.

    • hit

      public void hit(int damage)
      Hits the Klingon for an amount of damage, reducing their internal energy reserves and marking them for removal if they run out of energy.
      Specified by:
      hit in interface Hittable
      Overrides:
      hit in class Entity
      Parameters:
      damage - - amount to reduce the Klingon energy reserves by.

    • symbol

      public String symbol()
      Returns a 3 character String representation of the Klingon with implicit communication of its internal state.
      Specified by:
      symbol in interface HasSymbol
      Overrides:
      symbol in class Entity
      Returns:
      if not scanned returns " ? " if scanned and energy is less than 1/3rd of starting energy returns "-k-" if scanned and energy is less than 1/2 of starting energy returns "+k+" else if scanned returns "+K+"

      Description copied from class: Entity
      Marks this Entity as scanned, so it doesn't have to be scanned twice.
